c74object.name: o.routejoin
c74object.description: o.routejoint is a combination of route and join objects.

inlet.digest: Input to be routed and joined

outlet.description: Outputs all routed messages in a list

objarg.name: selectors
objarg.description: Arguments can be a mix of ints, floats, or symbols. The number of arguments determines how many lists will be joined.

method.name: list
method.digest: Join list based on a match
method.description: If the first item of the message is the same as one of the arguments of o.routejoin, the rest of the message is joined into the output list. If the first item does not match any of the arguments, the entire message is passed out the rightmost outlet.

attribute.name: triggers
attribute.description: Define a list of inputs that will automatically trigger output (i.e. adding an input to this list will make the inlet "hot"). Setting the attribute value to -1 will cause the object to trigger output for any inlet (all inlets will be "hot").

entry.name: anything
entry.description: The first item of any message received in the inlet is compared with the arguments. If it matches one of the arguments, the rest of the message is joined into the output list. Otherwise, the entire message is passed out the rightmost outlet.
